layer1.core_phrase: My universe is yours!

layer2.presentation: Welcome to my website. I am Luciano Rowlands, composer, singer, writer, spiritual philosopher, actor, entrepreneur, consultant and teacher.
layer2.invitation: I invite you to explore the site. Here you will find a constantly growing repertoire that I seek to make available to all interested people in all my areas of activity.

layer3.orientation: Below are some highlights and shortcuts to go directly to what interests you.
layer3.alternative: But if you want to know more about my work in general and about this site, click here.
layer3.newsletter_call: If you like the content and want to stay up to date, you can subscribe to my monthly newsletter A Letter to You.
